home.brief: Hi, my name is Santiago, I'm Frontend Developer with Full-Stack knowledge.

about.title: About me
about.firstParagraph: I'm a frontend developer with +2 years of experience helping different companies achieve their goals through the building or improvement of applications/websites. I've extensive knowledge of the React ecosystem on the client side.
about.secondParagraph: I can also create highly scalable and robust backend applications using technologies like NodeJS or NestJS.
